info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 2:11PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Washington and northeastern Rensselaer Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 211 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mechanicville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, penny size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Cambridge, Greenwich, Lee, White Creek, Easton, Schaghticoke, Valley Falls, Center White Creek, West Cambridge, Post Corners, Center Falls, Johnsonville, East Buskirk, Eagle Bridge, Middle Falls, North Cambridge, Fly Summit, North Easton, Crandall Corners and Millertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east central New York...and southern Vermont.
